required.name: Git
required.description: Version control system for all Git operations

installation.windows: Download from https://git-scm.com/ or use 'winget install Git.Git'
installation.linux: sudo apt install git (Ubuntu/Debian) or sudo yum install git (RHEL/CentOS)

optional.name: GitHub CLI
optional.description: Enhanced GitHub integration for PR operations

repository_access: Push permissions for feature branch creation
Access to both source and target branches
network: Internet access for git push/pull operations
GitHub access for PR URL generation

validation_commands.git_config_check: git config --get user.name && git config --get user.email
